articles.description: Analysts say gold could remain in a tight range in the short term.Back in India, gold demand was reported to be improving as the economy reopens
articles.content: Gold struggled in Indian markets amid weak global cues while silver held above 70,000 mark. On MCX, gold futures were flat at 47,309 per 10 gram while silver edged up 0.35% to 70,425 per kg. MCX gold… [+1776 chars]
